o.me> wrote:
> You'd be better off proposing an alternative HTTP auth metho=
d, if
> anything, where the client sends something like this (assuming the =
API
> key is a UUID):
>
>     Authorization: Key b67570be-3a22-11e2-8ca6-00=
15c55d83ee

+1, HTTP auth is a tragically underused part of the standard.
